de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine

Interface StateMachineBuilder<T extends TnccsContentHandler>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the state machine type based on its content handler (e.g. TNCC -> TNCC content handler)
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultClientStateMachineBuilder, DefaultServerStateMachineBuilder

    public interface StateMachineBuilder<T extends TnccsContentHandler>
    Generic builder to build a TNC(C/S) session state machine. The builder can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StateMachineBuilder<T> setAttributes(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed attributes)
      Sets the session and/or connection attributes, which should be accessible by the state machine.
      StateMachineBuilder<T> setContentHandler(T contentHandler)
      Sets the content handler, that should be used by the state machine to handle messages.
      StateMachineBuilder<T> setStateHelper(StateHelper<T> stateHelper)
      Sets the state helper which can be used by the states to obtain necessary information.
      StateMachine toStateMachine()
      Creates the session state machine.

    • Method Detail
